Mevenide provides a multipart POM editor (Screenshot below). Each page is kept in synch with the source page.
Screenshot 1 Pom Editor
If the POM is inherited (i.e. ${pom.extend} is not empty) then a checkbox will be present next to each field allowing you to specify if the field is inherited (Screenshot 2 below); in that case the field will be read-only.
Screenshot 2 Pom Inheritance

After having added elements (i.e. dependencies, license, resources, or whatever) in the editor pages, you can edit their properties in the Properties view (Screenshot 3).
Double clicking on a Table entry will bring up the property sheet. Alternatively the view can be manually opened (Window > Show View > Other... > Basic > Properties).
Screenshot 3 Elements properties
